p: It was observed that the diabetic untreated group showed a significant decrease ( p < 0.05) in MDA content (4.4 ± 0.6 nmol/mg) compared to the normal animals (1.54 ± 0.2 nmol/mg). Diabetic treated group with the A. conyzoides, however, significantly reduced the MDA (1.48 ± 0.2 to 1.47 ± 0.4 nmol/mg) ( Figure 4) compared to the diabetic group.
